property.name: hbase_classpath_additional
property.description: Additional directory or jar in classpath for HBase.

property.name: hbase_regionserver_heapsize
property.description: HBase RegionServer Heap Size. In embedded mode, total heap size is sum of master and regionserver heap sizes.

property.name: regionserver_xmn_size
property.description: HBase RegionServer maximum value for young generation heap size.
property.display-name: HBase RegionServer maximum value for Xmn

property.name: hbase_master_xmn_size
property.description: HBase Master maximum value for young generation heap size.
property.display-name: HBase Master maximum value for Xmn

property.name: hbase_master_maxperm_size
property.description: HBase RegionServer maximum value for perm heap size.

property.name: hbase_regionserver_xmn_ratio
property.description: Percentage of max heap size (-Xmx) which used for young generation heap (-Xmn).

property.name: hbase_master_heapsize
property.description: HBase Master Heap Size. In embedded mode, total heap size is sum of master and regionserver heap sizes.

property.name: max_open_files_limit
property.description: The maximum number of open file descriptors by process

property.name: hbase_regionserver_shutdown_timeout
property.description: After this number of seconds waiting for graceful stop of HBase Master it will be forced to exit with SIGKILL. The timeout is introduced because there is a known bug when from time to time HBase RegionServer hangs forever on stop if NN safemode is on.

property.name: content
property.description: This is the jinja template for hbase-env.sh file
